summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No.4915 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West from West Dravus Street to West Bertona Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same under Ordinance No. 56276 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
